block.p: 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,350-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, windowed kitchen, central air-conditioned; maintenance $1,049, 61% tax deductible; listed at $455,000, 10 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,350-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, windowed kitchen, central air-conditioned; maintenance $1,049, 61% tax deductible; listed at $455,000, 10 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,400-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, East River view, pool and health club in building; common charge $587, taxes $7,260; listed at $749,000, 8 weeks on market (broker: Douglas Elliman)

2-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,350-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, hardwood floors, central air-conditioned, East River view; maintenance $1,285, 52% tax deductible; listed at $569,000, 4 weeks on market (broker: Bellmarc Realty)

3-bedroom, 3-bath, 2,208-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, windowed kitchen, fireplace; common charge $1,542, taxes $18,000; 13 weeks on market (brokers: Markgraf Group; Trump Organization)

2-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 1,326-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, manned elevator, marble baths, granite kitchen countertops, oak floors, washer/dryer in unit; common charge $655, taxes $7,860; listed at $1.045 million, 10 weeks on market (brokers: Trump Organization; Halstead Property Co.)

2-family prewar town house; 2 bedrooms, 2 baths, eat-in kitchen, 2 fireplaces in primary unit; 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, den, fireplace in other; dining room in each; rear garden, 20-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,100; listed at $825,000, 1 week on market (broker: Brooklyn Bridge Realty)

3-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. floor-through co-op in a limestone; dining room, windowed kitchen, 2 decorative fireplaces, high ceilings, hardwood floors, original moldings and detail; listed at $425,000, 3 weeks on market (broker: Garfield Realty)

2-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 1,850-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining room, eat-in kitchen, high ceilings, hardwood floors, Manhattan skyline view; maintenance $1,041, 45% tax deductible; listed at $469,000, 1 week on market (broker: Warren Lewis Realty)

2-family, 75-year-old, former marina building with 2 units, to be developed; 150-by-533-sq.-ft. lot fronting on Eastchester Bay; taxes $8,000; listed at $650,000, 1 year on market (broker: Jacqueline Kyle Kall)

4-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 52-year-old colonial; entry hall, great room, family room, 2 fireplaces, 2-car garage, 2.11-acre lot; taxes $19,322; listed at $1.7 million, 14 weeks on market (brokers: Merritt Associates, Coldwell Banker/Country Properties)

3-bedroom, 2-bath, 3-year-old colonial; dining room, marble fireplace, 2-car garage, .30-acre lot; taxes $5,478; listed at $379,500, 10 weeks on market (brokers: William Pitt Real Estate; William Raveis Real Estate)
3-bedroom, 2-bath, 54-year-old contemporary; 2 fireplaces, 2-car garage, 1.6-acre lot; taxes $5,726; listed at $565,000, 6 weeks on market (brokers: Settlers & Traders Real Estate; Country Living)
